website_summaries.verdict: The SteelSeries Merc Stealth gaming keyboard updates an already innovative design by adding lights and a USB hub. Though the design may not be for everyone, the Stealth Merc should satisfy gamers who want more than just a unique key layout.
pros: Separate game pad area isolates keys in a game-friendly (first-person shooter) design
software lets you tweak key mapping as much as you want
cons: Game pad keys take some getting used to

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate lefty keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I finally just tossed my third Merc Stealth keyboard into the closet. For a lefty gamer, these are/were the best keyboards I ever got a hold of. I used the programmable keys for a lot more than gaming, I used them for imaging utilities and shortcuts that normally would be thrown over by the keypad to the right. even the dedicated cursor move keys elevated with ergonomic faces made navigation instinctual. I'm using my new normal keyboard and I'm already scouring ebay for a 4th merc stealth.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus A. Vitchell

customer_reviews.title: 10 years later it still kicks ass
customer_reviews.text: Forged by some sort of ancient dwarfs out of mithril and the spare parts from a gundam this keyborde is beyond amazing. Beautiful and functional calling this wonder of technology a keyborde would be an insult. Becuse when you have a Steelseries Mer stealth gaming keyborde on your side not even the most skilled neck beards with god and anime on there sides can stop your climb out of bronze.
customer_reviews.author: andrew j johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best Keyboard Ever
customer_reviews.text: Just... nevermind, they suck. I paid more than I did twelve years ago because it is is so awesome, but I don't want to think how expensive it will be in another decade... so forget I said anything and find another keyboard because if you use this one you are going to become as addicted as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard, discontinued though
customer_reviews.text: This is the best keyboard for gaming and I've been using it for 5 years. I've went through 3 keyboards so far, not for anything serious just a button started sticking and when you game you can't have that so I just got a new one. Once they discontinued it I bought a backup because I couldn't game without this keyboard, it's a shame they discontinued it. I know a few guildies and clan members who also used this keyboard, honestly nothing bad to say about it. Because it's discontinued it's now over priced which is a shame because more people should try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Making that at lest two years of hardcore gaming on this one amazing keyborard. I love this keyboard it has improved ...
customer_reviews.text: I am still using this keyboard in 2018! Making that at lest two years of hardcore gaming on this one amazing keyborard. I love this keyboard it has improved my gaming experience incredibly as an advanced gamer ;however, I feel like this board would also be useful to someone just starting to game. Super easy to clean. I could not live without the print screen button which allows me to screen shot my games super easy. <3 steelseries
customer_reviews.author: wrath

customer_reviews.title: The goat.
customer_reviews.text: It's unfortunate that they stopped making this keyboard. In my opinion, it's the best keyboard for gaming that was ever made. It's ruined every other normal keyboard for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan P.

customer_reviews.title: ... this keyboard for a couple years now and I like it. The color switches are nice
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this keyboard for a couple years now and I like it. The color switches are nice. The game setup on the side is the best thing since sliced bread, and in my opinion better than sliced bread. However the cord at the USB end is frayed and causes it to not work so well. I'm a bit sad about this fact. The keys are fairly stiff in the push, but they are basically the same type of key press you would expect from any normal keyboard, clicking and all. If it wasn't for the fact that the wire is going, I wouldn't have had to buy a new keyboard yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Rob W

customer_reviews.title: A very good choice for online gamers!
customer_reviews.text: We had an earlier version and after trying all different keyboards, we have reverted to using these again! Very well constructed and though it is a tad too big for my small hands, it fit my husband like a glove. We are both online gamers and we bought one keyboard for each so we won't have to fight over it! Smooth operation, easy to access buttons, pretty fancy lighting in the dark (wait till our niece comes over to play her World of Warcraft on our computers!). We would not hesitate to recommend these keyboards to our friends and families who play online games or just want a fancy keyboard! Great value for the money we paid!
customer_reviews.author: Just Mad .. madly crazy ..

customer_reviews.title: Good, but heavy as hell
customer_reviews.text: I use my computer on my couch and had been using a wireless keyboard previously. I thought it would be nice to have some gaming keys on my keyboard. A few thoughts: Keyboard is heavy, and Sturdy, it would make a nice desktop keyboard. Has pug ins for headphones and mike and 2 usb ports- though the ports look to be at best usb 2.0. The indication lights on the right of the keyboard pick up some of the light from the backlight on the keyboard that sometimes make me think they are on. The gaming keys on the left seem laid out intelligently and have a nice feel to them.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Klopfenstein

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised..
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I was skeptical of this keyboard because the 'gaming' products tend to be often more sizzle than steak. This keyboard however is all meat! I play mostly first person shooters and this keyboard is perfect. The controls on the left hand side are dedicated for your movements and action buttons and are laid out very intuitively. It is soo much easier and effective than the normal W, A, D etc... keys! If you're a serious first person shooter like me you will find this to be one of your favorite peripherals! Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Christos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing keyboard for gamers!
customer_reviews.text: This one is exclusively for gamers. If you don't game, I'd go with a different keyboard. If you are a gamer however.....I personally think this is the best keyboard I've ever used. It doesn't have the little LED display that some of the logitech boards have, however it makes up with the hand pad. This pad is amazing for every game I've ever played from MMO's, to First person Shooters. The thing can be put through hell and keep going. For me, this keyboard is a must have. This is the second one I've owned, and the first lasted 4 years until the keys were rubbed off, and is honestly still working today on my second system.
customer_reviews.author: Ragetrip

customer_reviews.title: to long to use
customer_reviews.text: A few points of interest- the keyboard is very long and the angle of the gamepad is at such a radius that my hand/arm fatigues very quickly- the other option is to move the entire keyboard further right but that obstructs my mouse use. I ended up turning the keyboard about 45 degrees to get it to work but I ended up going back to my old keyboard. also the Del button is in the #pad and the NumLock needs to be on for it to work, also found the volume buttons a little oddly placed. the quality is good and everything works as advertised -just not a good gaming board for me.
customer_reviews.author: Toby J. Thew

customer_reviews.title: By far the best.
customer_reviews.text: I play a lot of games, especially DOTA 2 and Minecraft and this is great for both, especially DOTA. The keys have a different feeling from each other helping you to make sure you are hitting the right one. The board is very heavy, which I like because it makes it stable on your desk during intense moments in DOTA matches. Which brings me to my last point that it is very durable, having been rage-hit many times without breaking, and also having been doused in beer and coffee a few times as well. I bought one for my wife too since she plays portal. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Makes gaming easier
customer_reviews.text: I asked my husband what he would like for Christmas and he said, one thing I would really love to have is a new gaming keyboard with the movement keys on the left. Since we moved to Kansas and the friend I would have help me make this purchase still lives in Indianapolis I was pretty much on my own. I Don't play PC games on the computer like my husband so I was flying blind. He loves this keyboard and has nothing but good things to say about it. When I asked for negatives he said he had none. I would recommend to anyone wanting a gaming keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: burplepatti

customer_reviews.title: Best gamer keyboard I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I pick this keyboard up a couple years back and I am still using it. I am surprised to see how expensive it has become though! For the most part, I have used it mainly for Bethesda games like Skyrim and Fallout 4, but man does it feel good to have dedicated keys that you actually use configured the way this keyboard does it! Would definitely recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: I love it and still use it, please bring it back.
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard. Still use it to this day. I love the gaming pad on the left for MMOs mainly. Warframe is nice with the pad as well. I can say even open world rpg games can be more fun, because I used it for Assassin's Creed Origins and The Witcher series. I would like it updated, mainly for more LEDs or more color changing effects.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after 6 years. Will that work great until I spill beer on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonoflaw

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, one major defect! And Customer Support is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, it's a nice keyboard. But the major defect is no way to simulate a mouse click with a key on the keyboard. I really wanted to use the Game Pad up/down and left/right pad for simulating the mouse clicks. But there was no documentation on this anywhere. So I went to manufacture and submitted a support ticket. 10 days later I get a automated response that had nothing to do about my question (Can you simulate a key for a mouse click). So I replied, 7 days later I got a message "It's not possible". So it took 17 days to get a simple answer, not good customer service. You might look for a product that is better supported.
customer_reviews.author: William Wright

customer_reviews.title: I really like but with one problem...
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Logitech 210 with this because the Logitech had horrible feeling keys. I thought the side gaming area key pad would be better. Well I took a break form BF3 and now I don't like the key pad on the left side. I wish the keys were more like the ones on the actual keyboard part not soft press buttons. Plus the game side seems a bit wide at times. I could get back into using it but after not using it for a while I find myself just using the WASD portion and that means the nifty little game keys aren't really needed. AWESOME keyboard other than that though!
customer_reviews.author: ERiCV

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love this keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard for FFXIV, and it's perfect. All the macro keys are easy to use, and the side of the keyboard with the gaming pad is a lifesaver. I'd buy this again and again, but since it's constructed so well and is of such nice quality, I doubt I will need to. The lighting elements are nice and allow me to use the color that suits my mood. I keep my gaming headset and mouse plugged into the extra USB ports that are on the back of it. Love this keyboard and I would highly recommend it. I've now had it since beta of Final Fantasy XIV and I'd like to always use this keyboard for the game.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Space bar problems
customer_reviews.text: Its great for games but the space bar has only one 'press' point directly in the center of the bar. if you hit it the bar off center it does not press the space key at all. A strange and kinda big problem for a key board. It's also a fairly loud keyboard. I only use it on my game machine so didn't return it but it is annoying. I would not recommend buying this if you want to use it to type more than the occasional sentence. The side area for gaming is fantastic if a bit cluttered.
customer_reviews.author: Flowers48

customer_reviews.title: I like the look and feel
customer_reviews.text: I am so so on this keyboard. I like the look and feel, it was purchased to replace a logitech that just wore out. I thought I would like the gamer keys to the side but still haven't been able to get used to them after a month. So the premium I paid to get this keyboard just not sure it worked out for me. Could have probably save a $100 and gotten another Logitech.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Good: The backlighting is really nice, 3 colors and each are quite vivid and illuminate all keys. The gamepad on the far left of the board is AWESOME. Playing Rust and other first person PC games has never been easier. The angle which its tilted at is optimal, as is the placement of the keys. It is the main feature here. Not so good: The integrated USB and audio input and output. The USB has never worked for me, even simple flash drives are too much for it to handle. The audio is a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming keyboard, very well built (owned almost 1 year now)
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is GREAT for FPS and RTS games alike. I've used it quite a bit over the last 6 months or maybe 1 year of ownership now and it's still in perfect condition. Very sturdy and very heavy... this instills a sense of quality in me as I'm sure it does in most people - I would recommend this to anyone that wants the custom config needed for FPS games with the all-in-one of having the full keyboard attached - very convenient configuration
customer_reviews.author: R. Fulford

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this keyboard before some years ago, I think it broke from overuse or a short..., not quite sure as I don't recall... however I love this keyboard and I didn't even have the software that allows you to program the extra keys. I specifically ordered this keyboard again and was able to get the software online, just love it! Can't recommend more for gamers!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for about 2 years now with about 8 hours a week playing the paint on the most used buttons have been peeled off but in no way that the performance has been hindered at all I think i will buy 2 more of these just to make sure that it does not disappear . I used to have the solo version called "Fang" and this is very similar except that this thing is attached to the keyboard itself UPDATE WINDOWS 10 THE UPDATE KB4034674 WILL RENDER YOUR MERC USELESS
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: If you're serious about gaming, this is the keyboard to get. Having the directional arrows on the far left make it ideal for operating the mouse and keyboard at the same time and the quick keys for the frequently used moves right across the top of those directional arrows were very well placed. I've already recommended this keyboard and the plain Merc (without backlighting) to about 20 people online. I really love mine.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: SteelSeries Merc Stealth Gaming Keyboard .
customer_reviews.text: this is a great keyboard for the gamers that beat the keys to death or a serious typist my wife types 140 words a min transcribing court docs this board should last a long time I like the usb slots and the headset connections the cord gets twisted as I do not use this on a desk however the cord is thick and looks like it will last the keys are lit and can be turned off it has volume controls on it and a mute button
customer_reviews.author: Handy Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard, out of date profiles.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is amazing though I wish the company that made it had continued support for it. It is still perfect for all current gaming needs you're just going to need to do your own key settings. Many current games still work with the default profile so it's still great for all your gaming needs. The keys are responsive with a nice satisfying click and the lighting is just right for nighttime playing. All in all I can't really see any downsides to this keyboard other than the lack of support.
customer_reviews.author: Tajlund

customer_reviews.title: A real gaming keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Best gaming keyboard I've owned. This is the second one I've bought. The previous one lasted 5 years. I simply wore it out (not counting the can of soda I accidently knocked over and spilled on it) so I bought this new one. The left hand gaming button arrangement is intuitive. This isn't just a standard keyboard with backlit keys and a few extra function keys that had a "Gaming Keyboard" sticker put on the box like you'd find from Logitech or some others. This keyboard has had the left hand button layout set for controlling games. End of story.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Adams

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as an upgrade to a standard keyboard, I use it to play WOW it is great made some macros and key bindings definitely, very versatile, and easy to customize. Cool lighting feature and you can set up different profiles for different games! Planning on watching this Item for a second computer. My only complaint is that I use a standard keyboard at work all da​y, and the number pad is slightly different, and causes some mistypes.
customer_reviews.author: G. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Keyboard Ever.  Period.
customer_reviews.text: The Greatest Gaming Keyboard, Ever. If you disagree, your'e wrong. I've 6-boxed Everquest 2 with this keyboard. I've controlled 64 virtual machines at the same time with this keyboard. I even used my 2nd merc stealth keyboard to win a fight. This is my 4th and I'm afraid final keyboard... Since they don't make them no more. When good companies cancel awesome products like this, its' a sign that consoles are slowly winning... /sigh
customer_reviews.author: sukting chong

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard has a great feel to it and appears to be the only one available with the left side keys in this configuration. I have seen others, but they have the keys set up on the right side where I use my mouse. I also like the back lighting with the adjustable intensity and the easy to use software to program they keys. I had one of the original zboard keyboards and between that one and this new model I have been using them for about 4 years. Really love this style.
customer_reviews.author: RPGKat

customer_reviews.title: Both my boys love it. I don't know anything about gaming keyboards ...
customer_reviews.text: Http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00292OW1U?redirect=true&ref_=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_108 One of my sons requested this KB after he had left his here when he moved. So I purchased this keyboard for him as a christmas present. Both my boys love it. I don't know anything about gaming keyboards since I do not play games.
customer_reviews.author: Nohealani01042015

customer_reviews.title: great gaming keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I have this keyboard. I bought it here on Amazon.com for 39.00 around a year ago. It was on sale. Reg 79 to 56 dollars. I'm not sure why the price has jumped 100 bucks. It does work well and the left side directional pad is great for gaming where you have to move around quickly. Buttons to program to do action is conveniently placed above. I also have key programmed for teamspeak or mumble.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is amazing in so many ways. The "gamepad" side took me some getting used to after using a standard keyboard for years but I couldn't ever go back. I love the different backlights and dimming options. The only real complaint I have is the number pad layout and functions. The 0 key placement definitely takes some getting used to and having to turn numlock off to use the delete key is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Sai361

customer_reviews.title: Love this keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: Having used one for about 7 years for gaming, I bought two more for my other gaming computers. It is the best keyboard going for gaming, and the price is about 1/3 what it was when I bought the first one. I have never had any trouble with the first one, so I hope for the same with these new ones. The keyboard is very fast and accurate, and will never let you down not matter how long you are playing or how hard you use it. I would recommend one to anyone who has the room for a slightly larger keyboard and loves to game.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Martin

customer_reviews.title: Work good for gaming but getting use to the key layout ...
customer_reviews.text: Work good for gaming but getting use to the key layout takes some time, but think I would go with a separate keyboard and pad next time
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F Spaniola

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: After all these years it still works perfectly. I think 6 yrs now.
customer_reviews.author: Beka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a mechanical keyboard for CAD work and came across this, and it's awesome! The programmable software is cool for setting shortcuts in AutoCAD and Solidworks and the backlighting is great for working in low light. Was so impressed with the quality of this product I have purchased other SteelSeries products all which have out performed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Bear M

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: If you want an all in one keyboard and game pad, it is perfect. The only down side is the keyboard is then compressed and you lose some normal functionality that typists would use. If you don't want to spend on a keyboard and separate game pad, this is it. Please note it is NOT mechanical. Thank you. GDB
customer_reviews.author: GDB

customer_reviews.title: MERC stealth keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son age 7. He’s a typical boy and pretty rough on stuff. This has been a great keyboard and is still in use today.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Crone

customer_reviews.title: seem like more of an inconvenience than a benefit
customer_reviews.text: Even though this model is more than 5 years old. Worth for the price of less than $40 every 4 years. I never installed the software, seem like more of an inconvenience than a benefit.
customer_reviews.author: ofaplic

customer_reviews.title: 10 years old, and still works great.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this keyboard for 10 years now and still works great.
customer_reviews.author: z

customer_reviews.title: and I must say that I really like this thing
customer_reviews.text: been using for a while now, and I must say that I really like this thing, I like you change and configure the keybinding and that some games are already installed on it, I like the angle and the gaming keyset, my wrist no longer hurts when I go on a gaming bender. A+
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Decent MMO keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Love the backlighting on the keyboard, the layout takes a while to get used to but that is expected just like a mmo mouse as the red dragon, or naga. the keyboard part is a tiny bit cramped for me so thats why it lost a star still highly recommended as long you don't pay 100 for it. I got it for 50$ or so and I'm very happy with the durability ect, 4 star HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: chris dates

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Bought mostly for the blue lights to complete a blue lit computer setup and was extremely nervous knowing next to nothing about gaming keyboards. Weird to get used to but not impossible. Very smooth keyboard and relatively quiet keys (something I've seen many people asking about in other reviews). Would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Court

customer_reviews.title: Dies as warranty expires
customer_reviews.text: Two months after warranty expired so did keyboard. I loved this keyboard till it died mid-game. Now the price has doubled. If you buy this keyboard be SURE to get extended warranty. The keyboard is the only one with gamepad to the side which makes for easy gaming & alas they don't make them anymore so get the extended warranty or be out of luck as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Cash

customer_reviews.title: My son loved the key board for the time period a gamer ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the key board for the time period a gamer keeps one around lol So no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Dronet

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best keyboard every invented for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best keyboard every invented for gaming. I wish they'd bring this back! If mine breaks I seriously think I am going to have to quit playing WoW. There's no way I could live without it! P.S. Don't let my wife read this post or the repercussions if it ever broke! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Many Options and Designed for Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome keyboard. Bought it for my grandson. He is a gaming master! He tells me it is awesome. The design makes it easier to operate the left hand options. It is large and lights up. He likes all the options it gives. Not being a gamer, I don't know what they all are but he is really into it and loves what this board provides.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L.

customer_reviews.title: Replacing my original Zboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought my original Zboard back in 2008 and fell in love with it from the first minute! 7 years later I just ordered this replacement and am sure it will continue to deliver. Even request Saturday delivery as it is essential to my gaming! I will put the keyboard and gamepad through it's paces as I am an avid gamer. Mostly MMOs however this keyboard has worked flawlessly on FPS and other games. Very little needs to be setup as the engine has the majority of games already configured. These are no longer available according to the Steelseries website so grab one while you can. If you are a big time gamer, this is the keyboard for you.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W Skelly

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two of these for my kids, they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these for my kids, they are well layout for most of the games they play, but if your kids play alot, the keys wear out fast. Would give 5 stars if it wasn't for the keys wearing out so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect keyboard for long gaming sessions.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is the perfect choice for your gaming rig and for long period of gaming sessions because have a dedicate key set, macros, back-light, USB ports if you own an wireless mouse or headset, audio plug-ins for your analog headset, multimedia key shortcuts and a bunch of features. Nice Keyboard and thanks to Steelseries. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Posadas

customer_reviews.title: Nice Feel, a Bit Hard to Customize
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard has a nice feel to it, but the key profiles are a bit dated. I got it for World of Tanks, but it does not have a pre-generated profile for it and I cannot create a useful one myself (so far). On the other hand it feels good for regular keyboarding and the illumination feature is convienient. Add a WoT profile and it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Clouse

customer_reviews.title: Nearly flawless.
customer_reviews.text: I had the original Merc for years, I finally decided to upgrade to this and I've nothing but good times. If you're a MMO, FPS, or even a MoBA player, this keyboard is perfect for your needs. The keys feel great, the layout is perfectly done and it's incredibly responsive. It also glows... I guess that's a bonus? For the price compared to the original merc it's a steep, very steep, increase just for the fact that it glows and has a few more macro options compared to the original. Regardless, It's great, I'd rate it a 4.5/5 from all the keyboards that I've had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary T Huntington

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my new keyboard it works great it has pre programmed game keys for a ton of the games that i play i love the lights on the keyboard you can choose from 3 colors to light the keys purple blue or red and 3 settings for each a low light setting a medium light and brighter light setting. the best feature is the left hand key pad has all your important keys within reach of one hand.
customer_reviews.author: holly ingram

customer_reviews.title: Once you get used to it you never go back ...
customer_reviews.text: Once you get used to it you never go back. This is the second one I purchased - the first finally gave out after ~4 years of daily use. one of the keys on the left pad finally broke. I had no hesitation of immediately ordering a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Rost

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this keyboard for Christmas and loved it. I wanted it because of the gaming pad on the side and the backlit keyboard. It was very easy for me to adjust to using the gaming pad. The only downside I can see is the 10-key is slightly different and takes some getting used to. Your Insert / Delete buttons are on the 10-key pad too, so you have to remember to turn on/off the num lock. My wife seen my keyboard and she liked it so much, we ordered her one shortly after. She loves that you can change the back light color and she enjoys using the keyboard very much.
customer_reviews.author: R.D.

customer_reviews.title: THIS KEYBOARD WILL MAKE YOU FEEL LIKE THE MOST POWERFUL PERSON IN THE WORLD
customer_reviews.text: THIS KEYBOARD WILL MAKE YOU FEEL LIKE THE MOST POWERFUL PERSON IN THE WORLD! *ahem I mean it's a really nice keyboard..
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Step up your GAME!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you plays PC games this keyboard gives you the tool set to do better. Be better. It gives you a more natural control.!!try it you will love it. It has keys for movement on the left. Keys you can map. And a rubber grip type coating so your finger does not slip. It also lights up. I cant say enough. It is a great affordable gaming keyboard!!!
customer_reviews.author: Insert name Here!

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for 4 months now and I really like this keyboard. I play pinball and fps and this keyboard is perfect for these type of games. The keyboard is wider than a standard and the game control keys on the left make this a great board. You can get comfortable while navigating through your games.The only drawback I have found on is the number key side the period and arithmetic sign don't work but I just use those keys on the main board. Thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tune Man

customer_reviews.title: A Must have for serious gamers!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best gaming keyboards ever! This is actually my second one--nothing wrong with my other one, but I wanted to have a back up if it ever went down--that is how good this keyboard is. I wish they would go back to making them:)
customer_reviews.author: William Malone

customer_reviews.title: Faulty back lights
customer_reviews.text: Half the back lights aren't working! It's a good thing the back lights on the left side (where the game pad keys are) are working or I'd have sent it back. Love the fact that this keyboard has a built in game pad, makes playing games so much better and easier. I had an older version of this keyboard before "Steel Series" took over, all the back lights worked on that one and it lasted me about 6 or 7 years before the lights just quit working.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Scheppman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for gaming, but not work
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is great for gaming. It has made my playing exp alot better with all games. I just want to tell everyone though, do NOT throw out your stock keyboard for pratical purposes. I use solidworks and autocad at home. It is not very friendly with work or typing manuscrips
customer_reviews.author: IBlackseven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my SteelSeries Merc Stealth Gaming Keyboard on December 5, 2013, this this is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: StriderHyru

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard 3 years running...
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this keyboard is the gaming key area, no one else sells a keyboard like this, its ergonomic button layout and shape of buttons are comfortable to use, comparatively to the regular keyboard buttons. What I don't like about this board is the under key lighting, it's not very bright on the regular part of the board however the gaming key area is, in darkness it is difficult to see what you are typing with glare from the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Different setup, but I like.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new keyboard amd wanted to be able to use a game controller area and a keyboard area to speed up my game reflexes. This did it. Like others I wish I could have the delete/inser/pg down keys and the numeric keypad, but once you get used to it, its easy to adjust to.
customer_reviews.author: Southern

customer_reviews.title: Where's the Software?
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my 14 yr old son. He loves it, but.... There isn't any software that we can find anywhere. It doesn't come with it, and the website that they say to go to, is for sale!! I can't find anything anywhere. He still uses the programmable keys in WOW, but not the way we were expecting according to the write-ups. Very disappointing. I would buy one for myself if we could get the software. I think trying to find it online gave him the Rovnix virus! (can't prove it) I would give it more stars if there was software.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Overton

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard I've boughten!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing keyboard used for skyrim and work perfect comes with three different colors blue purple and red fast and responsive and very durable comes with two USB ports and a headphone port. I recommend this product to any gamer!
customer_reviews.author: Nic Levin

customer_reviews.title: Good Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: It is a good gaming keyboard, and I am using it. It is not what I expected however. I am giving it 3 stars because I like it, but I do not love it. If I could trade it for a different one I would in a heartbeat. That is not really the seller's fault, but I would recommend finding a better keyboard before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Merc keyboard. I wore out the W key on my last one so I had to replace it. Going back to a regular office style keyboard just doesn't cut it for gaming. It was either this or a Nostromo, but the gamepad part of the Merc is just better designed; unless you want the analog stick on the Nostromo you're better off with the Merc. Note that you do not need to install the software for the keyboard unless you are going to program the keys or do macros; the driver that Windows installs works just fine; the volume and mute keys even work.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kling

customer_reviews.title: my husband loves this keyboard. he has large hands ...
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves this keyboard. he has large hands and likes the design of the keyboard. it is very comfortble for him to play games and type. the only problem is some of the keys become lose.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Rosheck

customer_reviews.title: So worth every penny we paid for this
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping - Would buy from this seller again -This keyboard is awesome easy to install the software and glows very nice in all 3 colors and easy to program for gaming keys. love the usb on the keyboard and the headphone and speaker jack. My son is very happy with this keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 years of loving it. Then again, nothing lasts forever.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ~2 - 2.5 years ago. Was fantastic while it lasted (I'd give it a 5/5 review during that time). Seemed good build quality but loading drivers on a fresh install (Nov. 2015, Win7) locks up my system. 10 year old MS keyboard works just fine. My only wish is that I had a working one now.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Maier

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Keyboard for big hands
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Merc keyboard. I'm 6'5", and I have large hands. Standard keyboards can be pretty cramped for gaming. This keyboard fixes that for me, and it's well worth the price. The resistance is perfectly tuned, and it's built like a tank. I look forward to many years with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carpe Tao

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I like the adjustable back lit keys, the left hand macro keys are easy to learn, comfortable to use and the install disc has pre programmed macros set for lots of games. The headset and usb plug ins are a plus. Seems to be a quality product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kitt

customer_reviews.title: I guess that just shows you how awesome it is
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for a friend in 2013 for $40. He loves it so much I was going to buy it for someone else this year (2014) but it jumped up to $150, I guess that just shows you how awesome it is.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L. Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Overall quality of the product is very nice but it has some inconveniences.
customer_reviews.text: The overall feeling of a product is good. It's little heavier than usual keyboard but it has two usb spots that I can connect something else(such as mouse) to keyboard. It doesn't make much noise when I'm typing and works smoothly. However, I can't really feel comfortable for game controller area where placed left side of keyboard. some keys are too higher than number keys so it bothers me using spells in the game. However, this keyboard is very nice and cool overall. The important fact is cheap. I won't complain this product is suck compare to price. It's fare price compare to its quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great for MMO games
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard i am new to the gaming market but this keyboard is awsome. My only gripe is the numeric keypad on the right also has the arrows on it and you have to be careful when pushing fast on the numbers cause they are real close together. But this is great for games MMO and FPS a like.
customer_reviews.author: Lzzy Hale Freak

customer_reviews.title: Unique keyboard for gamers, typing keys feel a little cluunky
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this keyboard. It has three backlight settings that you can easily switch through, the gamepad is unique and very helpful when playing MMORPG's. I mostly used this keyboard for SWTOR. Like most people have pointed out though, the odd numpad is an inconvenience. The actual keyboard also feels clunky, it doesn't have a nice feel when I'm chatting with someone. But hey, it's a gaming keyboard I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a replacement for my husband. Expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Taniger

customer_reviews.title: "S" key broke off! after a year.
customer_reviews.text: The "S" key broke just like the picture from another user...was good while it lasted but the quality is not there maybe lasted a year.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great buy got one for me than my wife the pad on the left works great ! only Slight Downside id the usb ports on keyboard are NOT POWERED so cant use for like mass storage but love them!
customer_reviews.author: SecurityCop

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Gaming Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is a keyboard you won't want to replace. I recently purchased 2 of them (One for me and one for my roommate) and we love these things! Even though it says that is not mechanic, it still feels as mechanical as it gets. You can change the colors of the keyboard and are very bright even when the lights are on. On the plus side, there is a small built in game pad on the side. This keypad is so easy to get used to and it is as if you are using a game pad such as the razer nostromo. Cons about this keyboard is the length of it, it is very long.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: second one owned.
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for mtyself a couple years ago, and it works fine. my son wanted the same one, and so he bought it as well. one complaint is the number keys. and the footpegs. mine broke off after about 8 months. so i guess thats two complaints.
customer_reviews.author: mike ahern

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming keyboard for smaller hands
customer_reviews.text: The good; takes a beating and survives liquids quite well (gave it to my 9 year old for Christmas). Very comfortable to use if you have small to normal hands. The bad......to hit delete you must first turn off numlocks, same goes for insert, home, page up/down, and end!
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard works like all other versions of steelseries merc stealth keyboards. Its got all the media buttons, full keyboard and game pad. However this is NOT the merc stealth as shown in the picture. I was expected the version that actually says merc stealth on it. Instead i got one that has in very large bold white print STEELSERIES which is smack dab in the middle of the upper part of the plastic. It just looks disgusting and considering my last 2 merc stealths actually said merc stealth this was a true kick to my balls.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, but bad durability
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard looks really cool and works out really well for WOW. However the keys on the actually keyboard are already wearing out. I used this keyboard for about 4-5 months and then I started to notice while typing the keys begin to stick and gggggggggggo like that. It has progressively gotten worse and about every 4th or 5th word they stick and makes typing impossible. Would be an amazing $40 keyboard, but for the money I paid I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Myles Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Love this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Love this keyboard. I have owned one for 3 years, and it still works great, and use it all the time. I build a second computer and could not even think of playing games on a different style keyboard. the side panel is awesome once you get past the learn curve. I am not sure what I would want to use if these keyboard every go away... Buy it before they are all gone!
customer_reviews.author: Heater

customer_reviews.title: Replaced this keyboard in-kind after 5 yrs of gaming
customer_reviews.text: Original purchased keyboard began to have some lighting - short issues after 5 years of hard use. Loved original, so replaced in kind & still love it. Especially back-lit keys at night & game ergonomic keypad on the left. unique board. Glad Steel Series to over this line to keep it available.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 17 yr. old and it took him awhile to get used to it because he really was happy with what he already had.. He is a major gamer but did not really care about all the extras on the board.. but has grown to love them...Just asked him what he would write. And he said The keyboard is Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Payne

customer_reviews.title: I love this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard. It has been great and I haven't had problems with keys popping off or letters being scratched off. It's held up well and makes playing games much more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee G

customer_reviews.title: gave as a gift
customer_reviews.text: My Mom is still adjusting to the new keys, but she loves it. She plays wow as often as she can and knows more about the game then I do. She loves the weight of the board and the colors that it can glow. Loves having more keys to play her game and she is having fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: d onken

customer_reviews.title: my favorite gaming keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I have been gaming for 2 decades now. This is by far my favorite of all gaming keyboards. I love the extra movement keys off on the left. This definitely extends the life cycle of the keyboard. The feel is solid and comfortable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Midwestern Guy

customer_reviews.title: Still a great gaming keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Used to have a previous version (with red buttons), which is still working after... 8 years? But I needed a change of layout. This one feels just as good. Not a silent keyboard but not too loud. The pad on the left is well thought out and fully programmable. Only downside would be the accompanying software, which really has not evolved in a decade and shows its age. But you can just ignore it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Fiorucci

customer_reviews.title: good strong product
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty keyboard for somewhat advanced keyboard users function keys are a must their is a very slight delay on the gaming portion of this keyboard looking into it further
customer_reviews.author: Braun

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING EVER
customer_reviews.text: GOT THIS FOR MY HUSBAND FOR XMAS. BEST THING I COULD HAVE BOUGHT! HE PLAYS A LOT OF WOW, STARCRAFT,ETC.....I DONT KNOW HOW HE GOT BY WITHOUT THE EXTRA KEYS! HE ALSO LIKES THE COLOR CHANGES. SEEMS TO BE WELL MADE, PRETTY HEAVY FOR A KEYBOARD.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: wife loves this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: well i'm purchasing another one because the keys are actually worn out this is the 2nd set of keys she had on it , i'm assuming from her long nails but the keyboard still works fine . i'm just going to get her a new one , she loves her mmo type games and lfd 1 and 2 and is always on facebook , so she def. wore it out after roughly 7 years
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge gamer girl so I have to have my gear light up for two reasons, I don't have any working lights in my room and this makes it much easier to type on when in a MMORPG or steam. The arrow keys are perfect on the side, no more switching hands between mouse and keyboard for moving my character, and overall just makes my gaming experience that much easier. It shipped really quickly, I bought it yesterday and it came in today in perfect condition. Nothing bad so far, I will update my review though if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Elizriel

product_meta.title: SteelSeries Merc Stealth Gaming Keyboard
product_meta.description:
The SteelSeries Merc Stealth gaming keyboard features 34 dedicated gaming terrain keys, making it easier and more intuitive than ever to walk, run, jump, crouch and move directionally in games. The gaming terrain keys, tilted at an 11° angle, are ergonomic and comfortable even during long gaming sessions. The keyboard features 3 different illumination colors (blue, red and purple), which can be set to 4 different illumination modes (subtle, ambient, intense and off). SteelSeries Merc Stealth supports simultaneous keystrokes and features a number of hotkeys for multimedia, navigation and other one-click controls. The keyboard features two USB 2.0 ports, gold-plated microphone and headset jacks all connected through a gold-plated USB connector. All keys on the keyboard can be programmed with the powerful SteelSeries Z Engine software, allowing for programmable keys and easy to use drag-and-drop macro creation.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



The SteelSeries Merc Stealth gaming keyboard features 34 dedicated gaming terrain keys, making it easier and more intuitive than ever to walk, run, jump, crouch, and move directionally in games. The gaming terrain keys, tilted at an 11 degree angle, are ergonomic and comfortable even during long gaming sessions. The keyboard features 3 different illumination colors (blue, red and purple), which can be set to 4 different illumination modes (subtle, ambient, intense and off).



Gaming terrain keys are ergonomic and comfortable, even during long gaming sessions


Merc Stealth features 34 gaming keys at a natural tilt to match your wrist position

SteelSeries Merc Stealth supports simultaneous keystrokes and features a number of hotkeys for multimedia, navigation and other one-click controls. The keyboard features two USB 2.0 ports, gold-plated microphone and headset jacks all connected through a gold-plated USB connector. All keys on the keyboard can be programmed with the powerful SteelSeries Z Engine software, allowing for programmable keys and easy to use drag-and-drop macro creation.



Choose from three illumination colors to match your gaming mood. View larger


ILLUMINATION PERFECT FOR GAMING IN THE DARK
The Merc Stealth features astounding three color illumination in red, blue, and purple to match your gaming mood. Choose your level of brightness (Subtle, Ambient, Intense, Off). Illuminated characters on every key make it easy to find what you need during intense all-night gaming sessions.

Z ENGINE SOFTWARE TO CUSTOMIZE EVERY GAMING EXPERIENCE
The SteelSeries Z Engine software that comes with the Merc Stealth allows you to totally control your gaming experience. It makes your keyboard fully programmable with easy-to-use drag-and-drop macro editing for quick customized performance. Z Engine comes with over 125 pre-defined key mapping layouts that you can use to jump quickly into your favorite games, or you can create your own layouts for a gaming experience that's tailored to you.

DEDICATED GAMING TERRAIN: AMAZING TOUCH AND RESPONSE FOR HOURS OF COMFORTABLE GAMING
Featuring 34 gaming terrain keys, the Merc Stealth makes it easier and more intuitive than ever to walk, run, jump, crouch, and move directionally in games. Rubberized movement keys offer superior response. The Merc Stealth is tilted 11 degrees to match your natural wrist position. 34 gaming keys are labeled and positioned for ultimate precision and control during gaming. The simultaneous key stroke response means no need to worry about phantom keys in the heat of the battle.

RULE ALL YOUR PC GAMING PERIPHERALS FROM ONE HUB
The Merc Stealth has two built-in USB 2.0 ports to plug in mice and other peripherals. Gold plated audio jacks are also available for headsets and microphones. Plus, dedicated multimedia controls give you total control over your media in and out of the game.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
The SteelSeries Merc Stealth Gaming Keyboard.

WHAT THE CRITICS ARE SAYING ABOUT THE STEELSERIES MERC STEALTH KEYBOARD
"Once you adapt and start using the WASD arrangement it's great. It's like using a pad that's specially designed for your left hand! Jumping into the Z-Board control software, the first thing that strikes me is that there is very little 'customising' to be done right off the bat. You let it detect games and go from there. That's it!"
--Tweaktown

"Overall, the SteelSeries Merc Stealth keyboard is a good product that is sure to improve the users gaming experience. The extensive configuration offered by the Z-Engine software is one of the main positives of the Merc Stealth. It is incredibly easy to use and the pre-defined profiles are a good base to work from when configuring our own profiles."
"We would recommend the Merc Stealth to serious gamers who use their machine mainly for gaming."
--Hardware Heaven



TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
 * USB Hub: Two (2) USB 2.0 prots
 * Gold-plated microphone and headset jacks
 * Cable Length: 1.8 m / 6 ft
 * Connection Options: USB
 * Dimensions: 21.1" x 7.9" x 1.1"
feature_bullets: SteelSeries Z Engine enables programmability of all keys
3 color illumination options - blue, purple and red
Anti-ghosting capability: Up to 7 simultaneous keystrokes
Rubberized movement keys for enhanced tactile feedback
Pre-defined profiles for more than 150 games

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars579 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
